Burger King Star Trek "Uhura" Collectors glass New Price: $10.95 Seller: lafshops View Store Feedback: 67.90%, 311 sales Ask seller a question Shipping: USPS calculated click to check Condition: brand new Payment Options: Money Order, Cashier's Check, Personal Check
This is the brand new collectible Burger King Star Trek "Uhura/Enterprise"glass! It is a surprise, really. But arguably one of the best Star Trek collectibles based on the new feature film, and perhaps one of the more intriguing Trek items of all time, could just be the Burger King collector’s glasses. It has been about 25 years since a fast food restaurant produced Star Trek glasses. The wait was worth it. Glass comes in a ultra cool box that features a ship and a checklist on the back. This is probably the best restaurant glass premium since the 1977 Star Wars glasses and certainly the best Star Trek glasses ever made. Next to the character is a clear delta insignia that allows for you to see the image on the back of the glass framed and almost as if third dimensional. All around the glass are frosted etchings of the ships and the Star Trek logo. This glass is real glass and classy, looking great as a display and certainly worth getting more than one for use and safe keeping. Comes with a free Mardi Gras bead! Get it while it's still available! These glasses are very carefully packed to arrive safely to your home. Check out my other items! Be sure to add me to your favorites list! ...
